summary:
## Lorem Ipsum: Dummy Text for Designers

"Lorem ipsum" is fake text used by designers and publishers. It helps them see what a document or website will look like without using real words. This placeholder text started from a book written by Roman philosopher Cicero over 2,000 years ago. Designers have used it for many years, since the 1960s, and it's now common in computers and online tools.
title: Lorem ipsum
